name: The Ninja Way (VM Development)
description:
Hanzo grew up in a ninja village in the Senjoku Jidai (Warring states) period in Japan. One day his village was attacked by " Shuten Dōji " and killed off his entire clan. Hanzo was filled with anger and wanted revenge on " Shuten Dōji " who attacked his village. While looking for " Shuten Dōji ", he met another ninja who was out on a scouting mission. The scouting ninja heard the events that took place in Hanzo's village. Seeing the anger embedded within him and his need for revenge, he decided to take him back to his own village to train him. After a few years, Hanzo had gone through intensive training from the village's top ninja's and was ready to test his skills to earn the title of the greatest ninja of the clan and take revenge for his village.
